name: cz-reality-scraper
title: CZ Reality Scraper — sreality + bezrealitky
description: Scrapes Czech real estate listings from sreality.cz and bezrealitky.cz. Filter by property type (houses, flats, land), any of 14 regions, price, and floor area. Tracks price history across runs — detects new listings, price drops, and best deals.

listing-enriched.eventDescription: Charged once per listing when price history tracking is enabled
